website_summaries.verdict: The aerodynamic shape and variable options make this solid club a great addition to your bag.
pros: Comes in a variety of orientations (right- or left-handed), different shaft materials, and configurations
Features a large sweet spot and a raised center crown for greater club speed
Aerodynamic shape, with a solid feel
cons: Some buyers felt this club was too heavy, or a bit stiff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice club .. great for what once were long iron shots ... just wish I could hit it better.
customer_reviews.author: KidneyCove3

customer_reviews.title: This club is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This club is the best! I think I could use it exclusively up to the green. It’s made a big difference in my game.
customer_reviews.author: CopyDoctor

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Product description did not mention that it included a head cover so I ordered one at the same time. Now I have two. Otherwise I'm pleased with the club and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Neal G

customer_reviews.title: Nice Club
customer_reviews.text: Well made club. I can’t hit it very well but that’s not because of the club.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: easy swing, get more distance that my old one
customer_reviews.text: this was a replacement for another Taylormade hybrid, easy swing, get more distance that my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used it once so far but very pleased with this hybrid
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Used it once so far but very pleased with this hybrid.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you hit a bad shot, it is not the clubs fault
customer_reviews.author: sam burkett

customer_reviews.title: Got what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: What to say ? I wanted that, I got it. Well packed, brand new. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hybrid club, easy to hit and it has a good solid feel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Swing
customer_reviews.text: Club is great as long as I dont swing like an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: james andersen

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for five iron that I hit around 175
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement for five iron that I hit around 175. Hit it much higher so has more carry than the iron. Tougher in wind though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

product_meta.title: TaylorMade Men's AeroBurner 2016 Hybrid Club
product_meta.description: TaylorMade Men's 2016 Aeroburner RescueA Rescue Made For Speed And Distance Aerodynamic breakthroughs help the TaylorMade 2016 Aeroburner Rescue increase club head speed. The shallower face and raised center crown speed up the club head throughout the swing.TaylorMade Men's 2016 Aeroburner Rescue features: * Shallow face, raised center crown for a new aerodynamic shape * New Speed Pocket increases sweet spot and decreases spin * Linear AeroBurner crown graphic makes alignment easy * Thin face provides maximum propulsion and flex * TM Aerospeed 60 graphite shaft * TM Speed 47 gram grip * Includes headcover TaylorMade...The Best Performance Golf Brand In The World
feature_bullets: Advanced aerodynamic shapes promote faster club speed and more distance
Raised center crown keeps airflow attached longer and reduces drag for greater speed at impact
Thin face and speed pocket combine for larger sweet spot
